issue.title: [PDTS] path::compare(const string& s) wrong argument type

discussion.p: path has "int compare(const string& s) const;" but it should almost certainly take const string_type&, since the third overload takes const value_type*.
This issue is the same as and resolves that issue as well.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to SG3 working draft.
